code: import React from'react';import BookCard from'./BookCard';import'./BookList.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookList=_ref=>{let{books,onBookClick}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"book-list",children:books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BookCard,{book:book,onClick:()=>onBookClick(book._id)},book._id))});};export default BookList;
